Name: Memorial Park of Hypoxia
About the game: Build your own piece of cemetery. Make it a place to memorize your dear ones or honor yourself. Memorial Park of Hypoxia is a simulation of a memorial park. Here you can: Choose a piece of land; Build different things, such as tombs, sculptures; Each land has a name of the player who creates it above it; Go and see others' places; Experience the calm and peace of Memorial Park and bird singing; Watch the weather changes; Alteration of day and night; Scare the birds away.
